snippet: Lingering cold kept shoppers at home, keeping sales of spring apparel and seasonal goods modest, but analysts say they expect better days to come.
abstract: Retailers report that revenue at stores open at least year rose 1.4 percent in March 2013, as shoppers held back on spending due to cold weather.
lead_paragraph: Lingering cold kept shoppers at home, keeping sales of spring apparel and seasonal goods modest, but analysts say they expect better days to come.

headline.seo: March Retail Sales Rise Only Slightly
headline.main: Weather and Holiday Hinder March Retail Sales
headline.print_headline: Weather and Holiday Hinder March Retail Sales
